title: Why Did I Recive  5 ,20mins leaver buster twice
body:
hi i hope u can help me i recived 2 bans instead of 1 of it i got a 5 times 20mins ban ok i understand that part but then it gave me it again after i evenfinished it im very confused angry and annoyed and btw i once left a game 1 game and it ban me 20mins 5 times....

-_- Riot Please fix this its very very very very very very annoying

replies.body:
Leavebuster will not ban you if you *only* left one game. You would have to have either:

* Left games in the past
* Been reported and punished for other sorts of toxic behaviour in the past

before the system would even consider giving you a punishment. If you were reported further while on probation then you may have warranted another punishment.

If you believe that the system is in fault, create a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to notify Riot of this.
